column1: == Road course ==

column1: == Track difficulties ==

column2: and the decision to include a full road course contained largely within the oval necessitated design compromises. For spectators

column6: and several large-screen televisions are needed. Seating outside the grandstand is limited to areas of the infield and along the 750-metre backstraight of the road course.
